europeana:record.dc:title: A new species of the Dung Beetle genus Synapsis Bates from Borneo, with notes on its relatives (Coleoptera: Scarabaeidae)
Zoologische Mededelingen
europeana:record.dc:creator: Krikken J.
europeana:record.dc:subject: Insecta
Coleoptera; Scarabaeidae; Synapsis; Borneo; new species
europeana:record.dc:description: Synapsis cambeforti spec. nov. is described and, by means of of an annotated key, compared with its two Sundaland relatives, S. ritsemae Lansberge, 1874 (recorded from Java) and S. thoas Sharp, 1875 (recorded from Java and Sumatra). A fourth species, S. cf. birmanicus Gillet, 1907, is recorded from Sumatra and West Malaysia.
europeana:record.dcterms:isPartOf: A new species of the Dung Beetle genus Synapsis Bates from Borneo, with notes on its relatives (Coleoptera: Scarabaeidae) (URN:ISSN:0024-0672) (Volume 61) (Issue 23)
